text: Frances Helen Allison (November 20, 1907 – June 13, 1989) was an American television and radio personality and singer. She was best known for her starring role on the weekday NBC-TV puppet show Kukla, Fran and Ollie, which ran from 1947–57. ==Other websites== * * Fran Allison at TV.com * Allison at the Museum of TV * Tribute website * Category:1907 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Deaths from myelodysplastic syndrome Category:Singers from Iowa Category:Singers from Chicago Category:Radio personalities from Chicago Category:Television personalities from Chicago
title: Fran Allison
